title: Dataset.add fails miserably due to crash within GitPython -- if operated within "reincarnated repo"

milestone.title: Release 0.6.0
milestone.description: A huge refactoring of input/output of API commands etc

body:
The code is as simple as `ds.add("newsub")` although ran within ASV benchmarking so may be there was some "massaging" of ds somehow (picking/unpickling but unlikely).  And then kaboom
```
               [INFO] Creating a new annex repo at /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_rAq5E0_clone/newsubds 
               Traceback (most recent call last):
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 796, in <module>
                   commands[mode](args)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 773, in main_run
                   result = benchmark.do_run()
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 456, in do_run
                   return self.run(*self._current_params)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 549, in run
                   all_runs.extend(timer.repeat(repeat, number))
                 File "/usr/lib/python2.7/timeit.py", line 230, in repeat
                   t = self.timeit(number)
                 File "/usr/lib/python2.7/timeit.py", line 202, in timeit
                   timing = self.inner(it, self.timer)
                 File "/usr/lib/python2.7/timeit.py", line 100, in inner
                   _func()
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 513, in <lambda>
                   func = lambda: self.func(*param)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/benchmarks/benchmarks.py", line 133, in time_createadd_to_dataset
                   self.ds.add(subds.path)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/distribution/dataset.py", line 451, in apply_func
                   return f(**kwargs)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 1109, in eval_func
                   return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 1097, in return_func
                   results = list(results)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 1008, in generator_func
                   for res in results:
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/distribution/add.py", line 326, in __call__
                   message=message if message else '[DATALAD] added content'):
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 312, in save_dataset_hierarchy
                   version_tag=version_tag)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 353, in save_dataset
                   orig_hexsha = ds.repo.get_hexsha()
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 993, in get_hexsha
                   return self.repo.head.object.hexsha
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/git/refs/symbolic.py", line 169, in _get_object
                   return Object.new_from_sha(self.repo, hex_to_bin(self.dereference_recursive(self.repo, self.path)))
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/git/objects/base.py", line 64, in new_from_sha
                   oinfo = repo.odb.info(sha1)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/git/db.py", line 37, in info
                   hexsha, typename, size = self._git.get_object_header(bin_to_hex(sha))
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/git/cmd.py", line 936, in get_object_header
                   return self.__get_object_header(cmd, ref)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/git/cmd.py", line 925, in __get_object_header
                   return self._parse_object_header(cmd.stdout.readline())
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/git/cmd.py", line 889, in _parse_object_header
                   raise ValueError("SHA %s could not be resolved, git returned: %r" % (tokens[0], header_line.strip()))
               ValueError: SHA 9cb3db34bd9dc9e43cda685491361c0ef0ee2466 could not be resolved, git returned: '9cb3db34bd9dc9e43cda685491361c0ef0ee2466 missing'
```
So far possible idea is just that 'gc' is performed somewhere and PythonGit's instance doesn't get aware of it

info -- datalad is of 0.5.x (0.5.1-97-gf817243a).

Actually I have somehow managed to "heal" it ... kept working on the benchmarks and then it was gone, not sure what change attributed, so I will open and then close this issue as non-reproducible but want to have a note of it.... ACTUALLY -- managed to reproduce!!!  as of  cdedf35df502762eeba977f03ad7842777543722  which will be pushed as a part of the next PR where I hope to get back to the usable state first :-/  so no autoclose :-/
